title: Random mystery gift from riot
body: I got a random mystery gift from riot while in champ select, i never got to see what it was tho... can someone explain to me what happened and how do i found out what i received. thanks!

replies.body:
As *Lew* mentioned, it was likely the Pick'em Poro Icon being sent to your account as a part of a wave that went out today. 

Let me know if you have any other questions.
It was just a Worlds [Pick'Em](http://pickem.na.lolesports.com/en-US#how-to-play) icon being sent out.
